00251    inline void Cell::incrementCapacity()
00252    {
00253       assert(begin_ == 0);
00254       ++atomCapacity_; 
00255    }
00256 
00257    inline void Cell::clear()
00258    {
00259       begin_  =  0;
00260       nAtom_  =  0;
00261       atomCapacity_  =  0;
00262    }
00263 
00264    inline Atom** Cell::initialize(Atom** begin)
00265    {
00266       assert(begin_ == 0);
00267       assert(nAtom_  == 0);
00268       assert(atomCapacity_  >= 0);
00269 
00270       begin_ = begin; 
00271       return (begin_ + atomCapacity_);
00272    }
00273 
00274    inline void Cell::append(Atom* atomPtr)
00275    {
00276       assert(begin_ != 0);
00277       assert(nAtom_ < atomCapacity_);
00278       begin_[nAtom_] = atomPtr;
00279       ++nAtom_;
00280    }
00281 
00282    /*
00283    * Return number of atoms in this cell.
00284    */
00285    inline int Cell::nAtom() const
00286    {  return nAtom_; }
00287 
00288    /*
00289    * Return pointer to atom i.
00290    */
00291    inline Atom* Cell::atomPtr(int i) const
00292    {
00293       assert(i < nAtom_);
00294       return begin_[i];
00295    }
00296 
00297    /*
00298    * Return number of neighboring cells. 
00299    */
00300    inline int Cell::nNeighborCell() const
00301    {
00302       assert(offsetsPtr_);  
00303       return offsetsPtr_->size(); 
00304    }
00305 
00306    /*
00307    * Pointer to neighboring cell number i. 
00308    */
00309    inline const Cell* Cell::neighborCellPtr(int i) const
00310    { 
00311       assert(offsetsPtr_);  
00312       return (this + (*offsetsPtr_)[i]); 
00313    }
00314 
00315    /*
00316    * Pointer to next cell in list.
00317    */
00318    inline const Cell* Cell::nextCellPtr() const
00319    {  return nextCellPtr_; }
00320 
00321    inline int Cell::atomCapacity() const
00322    {  return atomCapacity_; }
00323 
00327    inline bool Cell::isGhostCell() const
00328    {  return isGhostCell_; }
